channel.title: More Hard Difficulty "specials"
channel.description: I know suggestions are rarely worth submiting this far in, but I just thought it would be fun if there were more features that only popped up on hard difficulty, like how assassins can turn invisible. Specifically it would be cool if icthyosaurs could leap from the water and drag you in on hard difficulty. The code for it should already be somewhere in the code, (in some form) since it sort of happens to the scientist in the cutscene for the tranq bow.

item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
XenoSpyro:

https://images.wikia.com/half-life/en/images/5/5e/Tripmine_wall.jpg

Since I killed them with guns on the other difficulty levels, I assumed I wouldn’t have any problems seeing them or shooting them on hard, so I didn’t know to change my strategy. Ever since then I simply camp in a corner with the shotgun & wait until they make themselves visible. It works just as well on every difficulty level.

item.title: More Hard Difficulty "specials"
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
Personally, I hate when difficulty levels have different rules/features. Not to mention that I hate the assassin. The first time I played on hard I had no idea that they even could turn invisible, but if I saw one in normal lighting turn invisible than it wouldn’t have pissed me off so much.

I don’t think things should be exclusive to the different skill levels, but should change in effectiveness &/or frequency of use.

item.title: More Hard Difficulty "specials"
item.dc:creator: amazingcomedy
item.description:
The only thing that will change from Easy and Medium to Hard is the Assassins’ invisability, weapon damage, enemy health and enemy damage. That’s all we really know for now. I do hope they make Hard mode, well, hard. I thought Half-Life 2’s hard difficulty was not that difficult. But they’ll probably make it more in the vein of Half-Life 1’s hard difficulty, which is extremely brutal.
